description.en: Extra short comics and art related to Wagamama Kouhai-kun posted on the author's Twitter/X (@nolatanuki).

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”
description.fr: Dès que Gu Changge s’est rendu compte qu’il avait transgressé un monde imaginaire, le protagoniste de ce monde, l’élu de la fortune, a juré de se venger de lui. Envié par tous, non seulement la femme principale est folle de lui, mais il est également traité comme un invité de marque partout où il va. Heureusement, le prestige et le pouvoir de Gu Changge sont supérieurs à ceux de tous les autres, alors il ne devrait pas être facile de piétiner un simple élu de la fortune ?
description.id:
Begitu Gu Changge menyadari dia telah masuk ke sebuah dunia fantasi, protagonis dunia itu yang dengan beruntungnya terpilih, bersumpah untuk melakukan balas dendam terhadapnya. Semua orang sangat iri pada Protagonis itu, karena bukan hanya karakter utama wanita tergila-gila padanya, tapi dia juga selalu diperlakukan sebagai tamu kehormatan kemanapun dia pergi. Untungnya, martabat dan kekuatan Gu Changge jauh melebihi milik orang lain, sehingga dia tidak dengan mudah jatuh di tangan orang yang hanya terpilih karena keberuntungannya?

 

Tunggu dulu… ada sistem yang didedikasikan untuk meraup dan mengambil dari apa yang dimiliki protagonis? Gu Changge tersenyum. “Sepertinya takdir pun ingin aku memenuhi takdirku sebagai orang jahat di dunia ini!”
description.pl: Gu Changge zostaje przeniesiony do świata wuxia, gdzie z miejsca staje się obiektem nienawiści protagonisty, będącego Wybrańcem Losu, gdyż nie dość, że główna bohaterka rzuca mu się w ramiona, to jeszcze jest przez wszystkich traktowany niczym znamienity gość. Na szczęście jego postać cechuje znacząca siła, więc powinien bez trudu zmiażdżyć jakiegoś w czepku urodzonego dzieciaka, prawda? “Chwila… Otrzymałem wyspecjalizowany system, który pozwala mi okradać głównego bohatera ze szczęścia?” Gu Changge uśmiechnął się znacząco. “Zdaje się, że moim przeznaczeniem jest podążanie ścieżką prowadzącą do stania się największym czarnym charakterem w tym świecie!”
description.ru:
Гу Чангэ попадает в фэнтези-мир, где, по-классике, оказывается в шкуре главного козла отпущения.
Удивительно, что главный герой сразу же снизыскал расположение у императрицы, чем вызвал бурю ненависти в свой адрес. К счастью, Чангэ - уважаемый человек в городе и единственное, что его спасает от кары в данной ситуации это высокий статус в обществе. Подождите-ка... а вы уже знаете, что здесь есть необычная система рангов, в которой присутствуют яркие герои всех мастей? Проанализировав события, герой понимает, что выгоднее всего вжиться в свою новую роль и пойти по пути персонажа-злодея!
description.pt-br: Imediatamente após Gu Changge perceber que havia transmigrado para um mundo de fantasia, o protagonista do mundo, e o escolhido da fortuna, jurou se vingar dele. Invejado por todos, ele não só tem a liderança feminina de ponta-cabeça por ele, mas também é tratado como um distinto convidado onde quer que vá. Felizmente, o prestígio e o poder de Gu Changge são superiores aos de todos os outros, então não deveria ser fácil pisar em uma mera escolha da fortuna? Espere … Existe um sistema dedicado à ordenha e colheita do protagonista? Gu Changge sorriu. “Parece que até o destino quer que eu cumpra meu destino como o vilão deste mundo!”

description.en: Goyu possesses a unique ability: when he smells a scent associated with a memory, he can see past memories vividly. The problem is, whenever he catches a whiff of such a scent, his consciousness is pulled into the past, leaving his physical body frozen in place, dazed and unresponsive. One day, this ability almost leads to a disaster when Goyu is nearly hit by a car. Fortunately, Yoohan jumps in and saves him just in time. Goyu then discovers that when he is near Yoohan, the scents manifest as visible forms, allowing him to avoid getting lost in his memories.

altTitles.ja: メドゥーサ奴隷を買った

description.en: I’m not sure why I decided to buy a medusa in the slave market, but since then she insists a lot that I remove the blindfold from her eyes. Is she trying to petrify me? Or does she really want to see me with her own eyes?
description.es-la:
No estoy seguro de por qué decidí comprar una medusa en el mercado de esclavos, pero desde entonces ella parece ser muy proactiva con su petición de que remueva la venda de sus ojos. 
¿Acaso busca petrificarme? ¿O de verdad quiere verme con sus propios ojos?
description.pt-br: Não tenho certeza de por que decidi comprar uma medusa no mercado de escravos, mas desde então ela insiste muito para que eu remova a venda de seus olhos. Ela está tentando me petrificar? Ou ela realmente quer me ver com seus próprios olhos?

description.en: First impressions are important, but they're not the whole story...
description.pt-br: A garota que sentada ao meu lado é muito fofa, e isso é muito bom por si só. Mas então eu a conheci fora da escola... OH, MEU!!!

title.en: My Second Life Is a Healing Life?

altTitles.en: The Second Life Is a Healing Life?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha segunda vida é uma vida de cura?
Minha segunda vida é uma vida de curandeiro?

description.en: Eugene Felivia, the beloved youngest son of the noble Felivia family, known for its great warriors, gains a second life thanks to the grace of 'Felin, the Wizard of Creation.' Eugene dreams of becoming a wizard like Felin, who saved him, and using his powers to make the world a better place. However, the dark and harsh realities and his fate still refuse to let him go...
description.pt-br: Eugene Felivia, o querido filho mais novo da nobre família Felivia, conhecida por seus grandes guerreiros, ganha uma segunda vida graças à graça de ‘Felin, o Feiticeiro da Criação’. Eugene sonha em se tornar um bruxo como Felin, que o salvou, e usar seus poderes para tornar o mundo um lugar melhor. No entanto, a realidade sombria e dura e o seu destino ainda se recusam a deixá-lo ir…

description.en:
Pixiv Comic Version of [Wagamama Kouhai-kun](https://mangadex.org/title/2cc33626-5e8d-4795-b325-1426adc9d0a9/wagamama-kouhai-kun).

The story of an easily swayed, caring senpai who is at the mercy of his selfish kouhai's whims.

'Lovers in peril amongst troubled times, and a grand wheel of fate that awaits them'

You told me, my little Princess,

That a sworn promise must be carved into the heart, not a rock.

"Swear it in front of the Gods of Heaven and Earth, that Eunri and Gyeol are now wed. Carve our names onto here."

The young obedient groom, Se Gyeol, took out a pocket knife and carved their names side by side like the little bride had asked.

"As our names have been carved into this rock, it has now become an oath set in stone."

"Hmph. A sworn promise should be carved into the heart, not a rock, you know."

The Crown Prince of Sayuta, Lee Hun Se Geyol, 13 years old

The Crown Princess of the Je Empire, Dam Eunri, 8 years old

A sworn promise made at youth blossoms entrancingly amidst an impure world stained with betrayals and conspiracies.
description.ko:
난세(亂世)의 위태로운 연인들, 그들 앞에 기다리는 거대한 운명의 수레바퀴

내 어린 비(妃)여
맹세는 돌에 새기는 것이 아니라 마음에 새기는 것이라 했지.

“천지신명에게 약속해. 은리와 결이 오라버니가 혼인하였다고. 여기다 오라버니랑 은리 이름을 새겨.”
말 잘 듣는 꼬마신랑 세결은 주머니칼을 꺼내, 꼬마 신부 은리가 시키는 대로 둘의 이름을 나란히 새겨놓았다.
“칼로 돌에 우리 이름을 새겼으니, 금석지약이다.”
“쳇, 약조는 돌에다 새기는 게 아니지. 마음에 새기는 거랬다, 뭐.”

사유타의 황태자 이헌세결 13세
제나라의 태자비 담은리 8세

어린 시절 마음에 새긴 맹세는 배신과 음모로 얼룩진 세상에 고귀하게 피어난다.

altTitles.ja: モンスターのご主人様

description.en:
Everyone in a high school is suddenly transported to another world. As they are attacked by monsters they find that some of the students now have superpowers. They organize themselves into two groups. Those without powers are called the Stay Home Group and those with them are called the Exploration Group. On a day where most of the Exploration Group is out, the remaining ones that stay behind start the slaughtering and raping of the Stay Home Group.  
  
Here we meet our protagonist, an average guy with no abilities who had just barely escaped death at the hands of his schoolmates. He ends up far away in a cave on the verge of death, exhausted and wounded when a slime enters the cave and starts eating away at his hand. All he can do is utter, “…please… someone out there… help me….”
description.uk: Нахабно учнів школи було перенесено в хащі фентезійного світу. Водночас одразу почався набіг монстрів. Утім, деякі школярі були наділені надздібностями, завдяки яким їм вдається відбитись від монстрів. Упродовж нестерпних декількох днів учні поділились на робітничу та розвідувальну групи. Метою Розвідки було запобігати небезпекам, надавати інформацію про навколишній світ, його мешканців та підтримувати устрій у колонії. Через певний час більша частина розвідувальної групи вирушила на схід цього загадкового лісу. Наступним викликом для учнів стануть не звичайні монстри, а чудовиська, які ховаються усередині них самих. З цього й починається історія головного героя, середньостатистичного підлітка без надздібностей, який тільки-но уник смерті. Плазом, ледве притомним дістався до печери, перебуваючи у стані між життям та смертю. До нього підповзає монстр; діставшись до головного героя, почвара починає поглинати його руку, а все, на що він спроможний, – це горлати про допомогу.

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo You Yi Wan Nian Xiu Wei

altTitles.en: I Have Hundreds of Millions of Years of Cultivation

description.en: Since time traveling, the transmigrator Ye Fan has been living in seclusion in Tianwu City with the intent of living a worry-free life, until one day he awakened to his millennia of cultivation. While others feign at advanced cultivation, Ye Fan acts as though he knows nothing of it.

altTitles.ja: あつまれ！ふしぎ研究部

description.en: Goryo Daisuke is still unsure about which club to join. When he meets the three girl members of Mysterious Research Club while looking for the school's warehouse, he gets hypnotized to sign the registration form. Suzu who is obsessed with scary curses, Chiaki who only relies on her monstrous strength to perform dangerous magic tricks, and Kotone who can control people by hypnosis.
description.es-la: Goryou Daiseuke aún está indeciso sobre a qué club unirse en su escuela. Cuando conoce a tres chicas miembros del “Club de Investigaciones Misteriosas” mientras buscaba el almacén de la escuela, es hipnotizado por ellas y, sin saberlo, firma una solicitud de ingreso. Suzu, quien está obsesionada con las maldiciones, Chiaki quien confía en su monstruosa fuerza para realizar actos de magia y Kotone, quien puede controlar a la gente con hipnosis. Ahora comienza una nueva y caótica vida para Daisuke, siendo el conejillo de indias del club.
description.pt-br: Goryo Daisuke ainda não sabe ao certo a qual clube ingressar. Quando ele conhece as três garotas do Clube de Pesquisa Misteriosa enquanto procura o depósito da escola, ele fica hipnotizado para assinar o formulário de inscrição. Suzu, que é obcecada por maldições assustadoras, Chiaki, que só conta com sua força monstruosa para realizar truques de mágica perigosos, e Kotone, que pode controlar as pessoas por meio da hipnose.

description.en:
As the middle child who is neither the heir nor the cherished younger twins, Karina has lived her whole life hidden away from others. She, who only had one hobby of painting, found out that she only had one year left to live. So without a plan, she went to visit her fiancé who she barely knew… To annul the engagement as he always wanted.

"I won’t beat around the bush. I want to spend a year here."

"...Milady, have you gone crazy?"

"In return, I'll agree to annul the engagement."

But, she didn't know then. That she would receive the unconditional love that she had never received her whole life from him, and that she would come to have a desire to live her once meaningless life.

---
Though gifted with an ability to bring her drawings to life, Karina Leopold spent her years in the shadow of her famous siblings, forced to be the good daughter her parents wanted. But when she's told that a deadly disease will kill her in a year, she offers a deal to her fiancé, Milian Pastellio, with the goal to live the remainder of her days far from her family's reach. Much to her surprise, their encounter proceeds to change them both in a way she never imagined...

description.id:
Sebagai anak kedua, Karina menghabiskan hidupnya selalu mengalah pada kakak-adiknya. Suatu hari, dia diberitahu bahwa menggambar yang merupakan hobinya, membuat sisa hidupnya hanya tinggal satu tahun lagi. Tak ingin terus hidup tidak dianggap oleh keluarganya, dia memutuskan untuk pergi dari rumah. Dengan persiapan seadanya, dia pergi ke tempat tunangan yang tidak begitu dia kenal untuk menghabiskan sisa hidupnya.

description.it:
Come figlia di mezzo che non è né l'erede né gli amati gemelli più piccoli, Karina ha vissuto tutta la sua vita nascosta agli altri. Lei, che aveva un solo hobby della pittura, ha scoperto che le restava solo 1 anno di vita. Quindi senza un piano, è andata a trovare il suo fidanzato che conosceva a malapena... Per annullare il fidanzamento come aveva sempre voluto.

"Non voglio tergiversare. Voglio passare un anno qui."

"...Mia Signora, sei impazzita?"

"In cambio, accetterò di annullare il fidanzamento."

Ma allora non lo sapeva. Che avrebbe ricevuto l'amore incondizionato che non aveva mai ricevuto per tutta la vita da lui, e che sarebbe arrivata ad avere un desiderio per vivere la sua vita un tempo priva di significato.

---

description.ja:
家門の跡を継ぐ長子でも、家族の愛を独占できる末っ子でもない、中途半端な2番目として、いつも誰かの影で生きてきたカリナ。 絵を描くことが唯一の趣味だった彼女は、自分に残された時間があと少しだということを知り、今まで交流もなかった婚約者に会いに行くことに。 婚約破棄の書類を胸に抱いて… 「ここにいさせてください」 「正気か？」 「その代わり…婚約を破棄して差し上げます」 この時は思いもしなかった。あれほど望んだ無償の愛と関心を彼がくれることになるなんて。 そのせいで、どうでもよかった人生に未練を抱くことになるなんて…

description.ko:
가문의 후계자도, 귀여움을 독차지하는 막내도 되지 못한 어중간한 둘째로,
평생 다른 사람들에게 가려진 삶을 살아온 카리나. 
그림을 그리는 것만이 유일한 취미인 그녀는
자신에게 남은 시간이 고작 1년 뿐이라는 사실을 알게 된다. 

그래서 교류도 없던 약혼자를 무작정 찾아갔다.
그가 원하던 파혼 서류를 품에 고이 간직한 채.

"단도직입적으로 말하자면, 여기서 1년간 지내고 싶어요."
"......미쳤나, 영애?" 
“대신 파혼해 드릴게요.”

하지만 그땐 미처 알지 못했다. 
평생 가지지 못했던 대가 없는 관심과 애정을 그에게 받게 될 줄은.
그래서 미련 없던 삶에 이토록 욕심이 생기게 될 줄은.

description.ru:
Карина всю жизнь находилась в чужой тени. Абсолютно обычная, ни наследница рода, ни милашка, как ее младшие – близняшки. Однажды она узнает, что ей остался всего год. Поэтому она тут же помчалась к своему жениху, неся с собой заявление на расторжение брака, о котором ее жених, должно быть, так грезил.— Скажу прямо, я хочу прожить здесь год.— Миледи, вы с ума сошли?..— За это я дам вам развод.Вот только кое-чего она не знала.— Похоже, вы продолжаете делать вид, будто не замечаете, поэтому мне придется это сказать.— Скажите.— Вы мне нравитесь.Она никогда даже надеяться не смела, что просто так получит его расположение. Поэтому она и не думала, что у нее появится настолько сильное желание в жизни, к которой она не была готова.

description.uk:
Вона не була спадкоємицею сім'ї, або навіть милою і обожнюваною молодшою дитиною, але неоднозначною середньою дитиною, Карина, та, яка завжди буде затьмарювати інших. Дівчина, чиє єдине хобі полягало в тому, щоб малювати, дізналася, що їй залишилося жити всього один рік.
Так, вона раптом пішла в гості до свого нареченого, з яким у неї ніколи не було ніяких взаємодій. У її руках були документи, необхідні для анулювання їх заручин, так само, як він хотів.

"Чесно кажучи, я хочу жити тут один рік."
"...Ти збожеволіла, молода міс?"
"В обмін на це я розірву заручини."

Однак тоді вона не знала, що отримає всю увагу і прихильність, яку не отримувала все своє життя.

title.en: Akuyaku Reijou desu ga, Watashi o Anata no Seidorei ni Shite Kudasai!

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢ですが、私をあなたの性奴隷にしてください!

altTitles.en: I May Be a Villainess, but Please Make Me Your Sex Slave!

altTitles.es: Soy la villana, ¡Pero por favor hazme tu esclava sexual!

description.en:
The crown prince announced that her engagement was broken off and she was exiled. All my efforts as her attendant to avoid such a scenario were all in vain, unable to avoid the condemnation flag, my villainess suggested that she wanted to be my sex slave?!

_"Please break my hymen! I'm Kaito's sex slave after all. Please let out a lot in my baby room."_

She was once called the ice princess but now that has been warped, she's now begging for me to cum inside her. As the princess, she's as good as dead. She didn't show a single hint of regret or remorse during her first experience.

_"AHH! I'm cumming! Fine, I'll make you my sex slave as you wish!!"_

Together with Kaito who reincarnated and had known of her ruin, Chris became his sex slave happily.
description.es: ¡¿La villana sugirió que quiere ser mi esclava sexual?! Una vez la llamaron la princesa de hielo, pero ahora que eso se ha deformado, ahora me ruega que me corra dentro de ella. No mostró ni una pizca de arrepentimiento o remordimiento durante su primera experiencia. ¡¡Bien, te haré mi esclava sexual como desees!! Junto con Kaito, quien reencarnó y tiene el conocimiento de su historia, la villana se convirtió felizmente en su esclava sexual.
description.ja: 王太子から告げられた婚約破棄と追放処分。従者である俺の努力も虚しく、破滅フラグを回避できなかったウチの悪役令嬢様が――性奴隷になりたいとか言い出したんだが!?「処女膜ぶち破って！ もう、クリスはカイトの性奴隷なの。私の赤ちゃん部屋にいっぱい出して」氷の令嬢と言われた美貌を歪ませて、安宿で中出しをせがんでくるお嬢様。貴族令嬢としては、まさに死んだも同然。毅然さの欠片もない、初体験だった。「ああっ！ 出してやる！ 望み通り、お前を俺の性奴隷に堕としてやる!!」破滅展開を知っていた転生従者カイトと、幸せ奴隷になれた悪役令嬢クリス。

altTitles.ja: 魔王学園の反逆者

description.en:
Yuuto is an ordinary high school boy who, one day, notices a mysterious tarot card by his bed. He shows it to his parents, who give him the good news - as the son of demonking, he is eligible to become the next Demon Lord. As such, Yuuto is soon brought to a demonic academy in order to improve his devilish skills and earn the title of demon lord. And, you know, get a harem along the way.   
  
From the author of Masou Gakuen HxH and Ecstas Online.
description.pt-br: "A humanidade é nada mais que escrava para uma raça demoníaca - Um estudante comum do ensino médio, Morioka Yuuto, foi escolhido para ser candidato ao próximo rei demônio. Ele é transferido para o colégio Ginsei, aonde é tratado com desdenho pelos outros estudantes. [Juro que vou te fazer ser rei demônio. Por isso... me torne a sua serva!] Yuuto se encontra com uma linda demônio, Himegami Lizel, que muda o seu mundo e sua vida. Ele pode aprender qualquer tipo de magia instantaneamente e absorver poder mágico infinitamente ao ter contato com suas servas. Esse é um poder especial que os demônios não tinham e era concedida a apenas a um humano, Yuuto. O humano que se tornou candidato a rei demônio e desafiou os mais fortes demônios para ser o próximo rei! Emocionante e fascinante. A fantástica história de ascensão em um colégio de magia se inicia!"

description.en: Just four years ago, Rustica Genas was the most gifted knight in the Caleta Empire and one of the emperor's most trusted servants. But after challenging his will one too many times, all of her fame, glory, and power were stripped from her. Then what can poor Rustica do but shamefully fade into obscurity? Well, when the rival empire's ruler sets his sights on winning her heart and freedom, she might have a chance to reclaim more than just her reputation. What could be waiting for her just beyond the Great Barrier?

title.en: Kuro no Senki II: Isekai Teni Shita Boku ga Saikyou na no wa Bed no Ue dake no You desu

altTitles.en: Kuro no Senki II: It seems that I, who has moved to another world, is the strongest only on the bed

altTitles.ja: クロの戦記Ⅱ 異世界転移した僕が最強なのはベッドの上だけのようです

description.en: Kurono Crawford (Chrono Crawford), a noble of Cepheus Empire had a secret. It was that he came from a Different world… Modern Japan. Having the knowledge about the modern weapons and his sense of values, he was an existence almost like a cheat, aiming to be the “Harem king”.    Abandoned by his superiors, left in command of the Empire’s rejects consisting of demi-humans such as Minotaurs, Dwarfs, and Elves, and thrust into a position as head of a poor fiefdom, Chrono will do everything he can to rebuild and strengthen his forces and revitalize the land, aided in part by his knowledge of the other world.
description.pt-br: Kurold Crawford um nobre do Império Kefaus, tinha um segredo. ele veio de um mundo diferente… O Japão moderno. Tendo o conhecimento sobre as armas modernas e seu senso de valores, sua existência é quase como uma trapaça, com o objetivo de ser o "rei do Harém".    Abandonado por seus superiores, deixado no comando dos rejeitados do Império, consistindo de demi-humanos como Minotauros, Anões e Elfos, e levado à posição de chefe de um feudo pobre, Kuro fará tudo o que puder para reconstruir e fortalecer suas forças e revitalizar a terra, auxiliado em parte por seus conhecimentos do outro mundo….

altTitles.ja: 鬼嫁が嫁いできた

altTitles.en: The Oni Bride Who Married Into Our Family

altTitles.ja: 女将軍✕兵卒

title.en: Chiisana Kimi to, Koe wo Tooku ni

altTitles.ja: ちいさな君と、こえを遠くに

description.en:
Manga adaptation of the "10th place Next Light Novel Award 2023!(Paperback category)" winner novel with the same name, written by Tsukasa author of "Unlimited Fafnir" illustrated by Shiratama.

Sota former vocalist of a popular band, having lost his former voice, he moves to a new high school where there is no one he knows to try to live quietly as Kanata Fujinami.
However, when he meets Sora, an elementary school girl who wants to become a voice actor, Kanata's dormant heart is moved and the story of Sora's journey toward her dream begins.
description.ja:
次にくるライトノベル大賞2023 10位入賞！（文庫部門）
『銃皇無尽のファフニール』ツカサ氏と大人気イラストレーターしらたま氏初のライトノベルをコミカライズ！

大人気バンドのボーカルをしていたソウタは、
当時の声を失ったことで、誰も知らない転校先の高校で本名の藤波奏太（ふじなみかなた）としてひっそり暮らそうとしていた。
だが、声優になりたい女子小学生・空（そら）と出会ったことで、奏太の心の変化と、空の夢へ向かう物語が始まる――。

title.en: Return of the SSS-Class Demon Lord

altTitles.en: Return of the SSS-Class Demon King

description.en:
A man who fell into the demon world returns to Earth as the most powerful demon lord with absolute power.

However, what awaits him are mysterious monsters. Slash!
Blood stitches the air, and the man’s voice echoes once more.
“I’ve finally returned.”

The Demon Lord’s return to Earth marks the beginning of the ultimate battle!

altTitles.ja: ごきげんよう、一局いかが？

altTitles.en: Good day to you, how about a game?

description.en: At a prestigious girls' school, Sae, a shy high schooler didn't fit in with her classmates. Her daily routine during lunch break consists of playing her Mahjong game on her phone. Due to her hobby being maybe too old-fashioned, she kept it a secret, until she was found out by her class' charismatic rich lady, Chise! Will they with their diametrically different personalities get along through playing Mahjong...?

altTitles.ja: 今日のさんぽんた

description.en:
The story of a dog, Ponta, and his walker, Rieko.

---
**Support the author's:**
- [Social Media and Shop](https://potofu.me/rikirosso)

Transported back to her first academy days, Nerys Truydd revisits a life marred by betrayal and torment. Exploited and poisoned by her own family and husband, her demise was met with a vow to curse those who wronged her. Now granted a second chance, Nerys vows to rewrite her fate. As she navigates her past, memories of those who hurt her flood back. Determined and fueled by retribution, she seeks to reclaim all she lost. Can she overturn her tragic past and emerge victorious from the shadows of her betrayal?

title.en: Return of a Crazy Genius Composer

description.en:
Success, fame, family… In an instant, the genius composer, Min Hyunseung, lost it all. On the brink of death… he wanted to live a different life, one where all those continuous misfortunes couldn’t just be claimed as karma.

“How did this happen…?”

He was given another chance to live.

JaeJu (which means “skill” in Korean) grew up without parents in an orphanage skillfully, just like his name suggests. One day, he heard that the orphanage was having a hard time and would have to close in 3 years. While trying to raise money for the orphanage, JaeJu got an alert on his phone. On it, he saw a video of himself climbing the tower as a BJ (broadcasting jockey aka streamer). Seven years ago, a tower suddenly appeared and randomly took people into it. If you successfully complete the tower and become an “Awakened”, it’s only a matter of time before you get rich!
description.ko:
부모님 없이 보육원에서 자란 재주
이름처럼 재주있게 살아가던 어느날
보육원이 어려워 3년 뒤 문을 닫게 된다는 이야기를 듣게 된다.

보육원을 위해 돈을 구해보려던 재주의 핸드폰에
갑작스럽게 알림이 울리고
핸드폰에서는 탑을 오르며 BJ가 되어있는 
자신의 영상이 재생된다.

7년 전, 갑작스럽게 세상에 나타나
무작위로 사람을 데려가는 탑.

이 탑에서 무사히 돌와 '각성자' 가 된다면
큰 돈을 버는 것은 시간 문제!

핸드폰에 영상을 보낸 것은 누구이며
재주는 무사히 탑을 오를 수 있을 것인가?!
description.pt-br: Jaeju (significa “habilidade” em coreano) cresceu sem pais em um orfanato com muita habilidade, assim como o nome sugere. Um dia, ele soube que o orfanato estava passando por dificuldades e iria fechar em 3 anos. Enquanto tentava juntar dinheiro para o orfanato, JaeJu recebeu um alerta em seu celular. Nele JaeJu viu um vídeo de si mesmo escalando a torre como um streamer. Sete anos atrás, a torre apareceu de repente e aleatoriamente levou pessoas para lá. Se completar a torre com sucesso e se tornar um “Despertado”, é só questão de tempo até que fique rico!

description.en:
Our protagonist, who cleared the extremely difficult of Vanta Black Ring a thousand times, awoke in the body of Ordinary Villager A (Hans) in Aram Village, in the tutorial area. 

Monsters were attacking the village! In the midst of life and death, he couldn't help but think of the hero named Cadis and how he'd show up and defeat the monsters - until that very hero died with a single attack. Just when he thought everything was over, he absorbed the hero's abilities!

What happened to the protagonist who wanted to survive comfortably beside the hero, exactly?

title.en: Kimi wa Yakamashi Tojite yo Kuchi o!

altTitles.ja: 君は喧し閉じてよ口を！

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi ha Yakamashi Tojite yo Kuchi wo!

altTitles.en: You're Too Noisy, So Just Shut It Already!
You Talk Too Much, So Just Shut It Already!

altTitles.vi: Cậu Ồn Ào Quá, Im lặng Giùm Tớ Đi!

altTitles.ru: Ты слишком много говоришь, так что заткнись уже!

altTitles.tl: Ang Ingay Mo Kaya Manahimik Ka Na Lang!

description.en: Hīragi Tsukino was born deaf. When she transfers to a new school, she meets a talkative boy named Enomoto Taiyō. Tsukino is slightly taken aback by Taiyō, who talks to her without regard to the fact that she can't hear.
description.ja: 柊月乃は生まれつき耳が聞こえない。そんな彼女が転校先で出会ったのは、おしゃべりな男子・榎本太陽。聞こえないことなんかお構いなしにしゃべりかけてくる太陽に若干引き気味な月乃。
description.ru: Хиираги Цукино родилась глухой. Когда она переводится в новую школу, она встречает говорливого мальчика по имени Эномото Тайо. Цукино немного обескуражена тем, что Тайо разговаривает с ней, не заботясь о том, что она не может его слышать...
description.vi: Hiiragi Tsukino là một cô bạn bị khiếm thính bẩm sinh. Khi cậu ấy chuyển đến trường mới, cậu ấy gặp được một cậu bạn lắm mồm tên Enomoto Taiyo. Tại đây, Tsukino luôn bị xoay tròn bởi những câu chuyện xàm xí của Taiyo bất chấp việc cô không thể nghe được cậu ta nói gì.

description.en:
The human race plunged into a war against dragons, who have invaded the earth. At the same time, among the humans arose people with supernatural powers, called psykers.

Through the countless sacrifices of psykers, the war seemed to be coming to an end with the human race as the victors. But when a psyker with the ability to see the future foretold that the dragons will be returning in 15 years, the people established Ark, a facility to train children born with psychic abilities to prepare for the last war of the human race.

There are only three years remaining until the prophesized war. What will happen next?!

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/kill-the-dragon/list?title_no=4618)
description.id:
"Bertahan hiduplah sekuat tenaga." Umat manusia mendapat deklarasi kehancuran dari penyerang 'Dragon'. Di dunia yang mulai runtuh ini, seorang yatim piatu perang bernama Lee Han, dilatih menjadi 'Psyker' untuk melindungi manusia!

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/kill-the-dragon/list?title_no=4618)
description.ko:
"필사적으로 살아남아라."

인류는 침략자 '드래곤'에게 멸망을 선고받았다.
붕괴 직전의 세계에서 인류를 수호하기 위해
전쟁고아 이한은 '사이커'로 각성한다!

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/kill-the-dragon/list?title_no=4618)

altTitles.es: El archimago que trascendiendo a través de la regresión

altTitles.ja: 回帰して世界を変える大魔法使い

altTitles.vi: Ma pháp sư vĩ đại hồi quy

description.ar:
ميخائيل والبورجس، الساحر الوحيد ذو الدائرة التاسعة في العالم، سقط في معركة بسبب بطل ملعون، وتمكن من إلقاء تعويذة سحرية أخيرة متقدمة، <العودة في الزمن>، مع هذه القدرة، عاد قبل ٢٠ عامًا. “حسنًا. سأصبح البطل بدلا من ذلك”

description.en:
Mikhail Walpurgis, the world’s only 9th-circle Archmage, fell in battle due to a damned hero, and managed to cast one final advanced magic spell, <TIME REVERSAL>. As time rewound, he regressed to 20 years ago.

“Fine. I’ll just become the hero instead.”

description.es:
Mikhail Walpurgis, el único archimago del mundo del noveno circulo, cayo en batalla por culpa de un maldito héroe, y consiguió lanzar un ultimo hechizo de magia avanzada, <Reversión de tiempo>. Al rebobinar el tiempo, retrocedió 20 años atrás.

“Bien. Me convertiré en el héroe en su lugar.”

«Bien. Je deviendrai juste le héros à la place.»

Михаил Вальфургис, единственный в мире маг 9-го круга, пал в ожесточенном бою из-за воина, проигравшего гнусному демону. В последний момент, на пороге смерти, он сумел применить могущественное магическое заклинание <Возращение во времени>. Обратив время вспять, он вернулся на 20 лет назад.

"Отлично, теперь я займу место того воина"

title.en: I Became a Renowned Family’s Sword Prodigy

altTitles.ru: Стал гением фехтования из великой семьи

altTitles.es-la: Me Convertí en el Prodigio de la Espada de una Familia de Renombre.

description.en:
Baek Woojin is the youngest son of a renowned swordsman family who has neither talent in swordsmanship nor an impressive Aura.
Although he was dishonored by his own family and killed, he reincarnates as the owner of a Magic Sword.

His only goal is the destruction of his own family.
description.ko:
검술 재능도, 타고난 오러도 없었지만 누구보다 열심히 노력했던 검술명가 막내아들 백우진.
가문에서 버려져 비참하게 목숨을 잃었지만,마검의 주인이 되어 10년 전으로 회귀한다.
가문을 무너뜨리겠다는 일념으로.

title.en: Isekai Raku Raku Survival: Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Rakuraku Survival: Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.en: Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island With Four Beautiful Girls

description.en:
More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!

With the way back to Earth blocked, thus began a dangerous life of survival on an uninhabited island in another world!!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！ こうして地球への帰り道は閉ざされたまま、異世界の無人島で危険なサバイバル生活が始まった！！

---

- ![Syosetsu+18](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7758hj/)

title.en: The Words of The Beloved Sun

description.en: ‘One will become king, and the other will become a sacrifice for the king.’ On the day Crown Princes Tae Chanryang and Tae Howol were born, a prophecy came down from the heavens. Who will be the last to survive?

Gyeongbok Lee possesses a gift that grants him a sixth sense and supernatural foresight -- however, this ability comes at a steep price, debilitating him each time it is used. But when Gyeongbok tries virtual reality gaming for the first time, he makes a startling discovery: not only could he leverage his psychic ability to gain a significant advantage in the virtual world, but he was also entirely free from its afflictions. Seizing this opportunity, Gyeongbok sets out to become a legendary video game streamer, turning his curse into his greatest asset.

title.en: When the Strange Gods Cause Chaos, I Turn My Hand and Slay Them

altTitles.zh: 道诡异神作乱，我反手就屠神

description.en: Young Lu Yu traverses to a different world and acquires the "No Rush, Take Your Time Lottery System." In this new world, peculiar gods, buddhas, and demons are worshipped everywhere, giving rise to various sects. The followers fervently desire their deities to descend and either rule or destroy the world. Consequently, the imperial court establishes the "Demon Suppression Command," a special agency dedicated to investigating such events...

Amon Drake arrives in the capital with dreams of success. On his first day as a teacher at the prestigious Amonis Academy, he is met with shocking news:

"Haven't you heard? This academy is on the brink of bankruptcy."

On top of that, the only people left at the academy are a gambling-addicted principal and drunken teachers. Amon thought,

"If the academy goes bankrupt, doesn't that mean my contract would become void too?"

They say escape favors the intelligent. If you don’t want to waste your life away, bring the academy to ruin.

The story of a wise man's escape from the academy begins now!

title.en: I Became the Descendant of the Heavenly Demon

altTitles.en: I Became a Descendant of the Heavenly Demon

description.en:
Jin Suho lost his mother as a child and decided to become a hunter as he sought revenge for her.
He gave his life to training himself and finally became a B-rank hunter.

Then one day, Suho meets a mysterious man at a Red Gate, which appeared by chance.
The mysterious man who introduced himself as the Heavenly Demon revealed to Jin Suho that Suho was his descendant and that he requires Suho’s body to deal with his rival, the Blood Demon.
description.ko:
어린 시절 어머니를 잃고 복수를 위해 헌터가 되겠다 결심한 진수호.
죽을 만큼 노력했으나, 끝내 B급 헌터에 그치게 되는데.

그러던 어느날, 수호는 우연한 기회에 발생한 레드 게이트에서 의문의 남자를 만나게 된다.
그는 자신을 천마라 소개하며 진수호가 그의 후손이며 혈마라는 호적수를 상대하기 위해 자손의 몸을 빼앗으려 드는데.

description.en:
The Bloody, Murderous Ghoul, the Mad Dog of the Battlefield…
The countless nicknames of Libertisha, who was driven into war from a young age.

After the war ended, she received an offer to marry a duke, and her partner was...

"Who the hell are you? Get lost."

Little did she know it would be a child!

They were eventually wed after many trials and tribulations. However, during a mission she became trapped in an unknown space. Once she finally made it out, ten years had passed outside.

But now...

"Stay with me, Leti."

Where did my little kitten-like husband go? Now my all-grown-up husband is obsessed with me?!

altTitles.ja: カペタ

description.en:
Taira Capeta was a 4th grader boy. He had lost his mother when he had been very little. Although he pretended to be tough in front of his father, actually he felt lonely. One day, his father brought junk parts home from his workplace and made a racing kart. Soon, they went to a circuit to drive the kart. However, Capeta found that its frame was bent and it could hardly run straight. But, with his technique he managed the kart. Furthermore, he followed soon after the fast kart and he could nearly leave it behind. The driver in the kart was Minamoto Naomi, the champion of the East Japan Junior Kart. Looking at their chase, Naomi’s mother, Minamoto Nanako, advised Capeta to take part in the official race.  
  
This manga won the Kodansha Manga Award for shōnen in 2005.
description.pt-br:
Taira Capeta também conhecido como “Capeta”, é um menino de 10 anos, cujo pai, viúvo, de nome Shige Taira, trabalha em obras de pavimentação de uma empresa. Após concluir um trabalho de pavimentação em uma pista de kart, o pai vê um menino correndo na pista e fica pasmo com a velocidade e a emoção aparente do esporte. 
Percebendo que seu filho tem interesse em carros de corrida (especialmente pela Fórmula 1), Shigeo pergunta ao dono do circuito se ele pode usar algumas peças antigas que estavam empilhadas no lixo do circuito. Levando as peças para a empresa onde trabalha, ele consegue construir um kart. O chefe de Shige, o Sr. Ikari, inicialmente a contragosto, fornece um motor de gerador de 4 tempos para o kart. 
Determinado, Capeta, em sua primeira vez em uma pista de corrida, consegue não só dominar os problemas de seu kart, mas também começa as tentativas para ultrapassar pela linha de dentro o jovem piloto Naomi Minamoto. Naomi é um piloto jovem e talentoso que dirige para a equipe Auto House Liarize Racingnota 1. Esta tentativa de ultrapassagem espanta Naomi tanto que ele pisa fundo no acelerador de seu kart, mantendo-se na dianteira de Capeta. Isso enfurece sua mãe, também chefe da equipe, Nanako Minamoto, pois se tratava apenas de um aquecimento para um motor totalmente novo. Capeta conta com a ajuda de Nobu Andou, seu assistente técnico e de Monami Suzuki o gerente da equipe.

altTitles.ja: ファミコンロッキー

description.en:
(from wikipedia.ja):

The main character, Yuki Todoroki, uses a variety of game techniques that he has developed himself to compete against the best players on the NES. Various tournaments are held, ranging from a neighborhood association-level tournament to a match against a secret society plotting a global conspiracy.

In the "Shogakugakusei Gosei" serialization, Yuki Todoroki plays against numerous opponents on the NES, but his opponents are different from those in the "CoroCoro Comics" serialization, and the games used in the matches are also different from those in the "CoroCoro Comics" version. Some games, such as "Super Mario Bros." In "Bessatsu Koro Koro Comic" a joint production with Kaoru Obayashi's "Radio Controlled Boy" which was also serialized in the same magazine, proved the popularity of the NES and radio controller, two major hobbies of the time. This chapter was included in Tentomushi Comics' "Hero Special".

title.en: Kao ni denai Kashiwada-san to Kao ni deru Ota-kun

altTitles.ja: 顔に出ない柏田さんと顔に出る太田君

altTitles.ko: 얼굴에 드러나지 않는 카시와다 양과 얼굴에 드러나는 오오타 군

altTitles.pt-br: A inexpressiva Kashiwada-san e o emotivo Oota-kun

description.en:
Meet Kashiwada-san, a female middle-school student, who remains emotionless regardless of how she is meddled with.  
And Oota-kun, unable to control his facial expressions, is the complete opposite of Kashiwada-san–but he keeps messing with her, against his better judgment?!  
Though the two of them are the exact opposite, will a mutual love eventually develop between them…?  
 

---

**Links:**  
- [Official Korean Translation](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/zktldhkek)
description.pt: Conheça Kashiwada-san, uma estudante do ensino médio, que permanece sem expressões, independentemente do que ela está sentindo. E Oota-kun, incapaz de controlar suas expressões faciais, é o completo oposto de Kashiwada-san, mas ele continua mexendo com ela, será que ele vai chegar a algum lugar? Embora ambos sejam exatamente o oposto, um amor mútuo acabará se desenvolvendo entre eles …?

title.en: The Villainess Can't Take Revenge on Her Reaper Father

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢は死神パパに復讐がしたいのに！ ～人生2周目、パパの心の声が可愛すぎてまさかの愛され物語！？～

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuyaku Reijou wa Shinigami Papa ni Fukushuu ga Shitai no ni! ~Jinsei Nishuume, Papa no Kokoro no Koe ga Kawaisugite Masaka no Aisare Monogatari!?~

altTitles.en: Even Though the Villainess Wants to Take Revenge on Her Reaper Dad ~This Is My Second Life, but I Can Hear What Papa’s Heart Is Saying and It’s Too Cute! An Unlikely Story about Getting Loved!?~

description.en: The villainess wants to take revenge on her reaper father! Capella Axicon, the daughter of two great dukes, faces a dire situation after being accused of murdering her fiancé, Prince Oberon. Seeking help from her only remaining family, her father, the Reaper Duke, she's met with his ruthless demeanor. "I want revenge on my father!" Her earnest wish is fulfilled after her execution as she's granted a new beginning as a baby. Surprisingly, she can now hear her father's heart which has turned too cute to be a beloved tale...? "Where in the world is that ruthless Reaper Duke? What's going to happen to my revenge?"

title.en: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden:  Kikuri Hiroi's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！外伝　廣井きくりの深酒日記

altTitles.en: Bocchi the Rock! Side Story: Hiroi Kikuri's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ru: Одинокий Рокер! Спин-офф: Дневник пьяницы Хирои Кикури

altTitles.vi: Bocchi the Rock! Ngoại Truyện: Nhật Ký Say Rượu của Hiroi Kikuri
Bocchi the Rock! Ngoại truyện: Nhật ký say tít mù của Hiroi Kikuri

altTitles.ja-ro: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden: Hiroi Kikuri no Fukazake Nikki

description.en: Kikuri Hiroi (25 years old). She is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK", and she loves alcohol. She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment of the live house, so she seems to be short of money. She lives in a 52-year-old apartment without a bath, and sometimes borrows showers from her friends and acquaintances. She is regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, which she counters with a "happiness spiral" with the help of alcohol. What is her daily life like...?!

altTitles.ja: 新婚のいろはさん
お忍び同棲

description.en: Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!
description.ja: 17歳の美少女・たえと、まじめな会社員の小太郎。一見幸せそうに見える二人には誰にも言えない秘密があった――伊賀・甲賀のライバル忍者がこっそり同棲生活を送る、まったりラブコメ！
description.pt-br: Tae, uma linda garota de 17 anos, e Kotaro, um sério trabalhador de escritório. Essas duas pessoas aparentemente felizes têm um segredo que não podem revelar a ninguém - os ninjas rivais de Iga e Kouga vivem secretamente juntos nesta comédia romântica descontraída!

title.en: The Hero Became the Duke's Eldest Son

description.en:
Aden Albireo, the "Dragon Slayer King", was a hero who saved the world by eliminating the Berserker and the Underlord. However, he was betrayed by those who whispered friendship to him, and met his death...

"I didn't know I would be resurrected like this?!"

15 years before the Underlord's resurrection, 'Aden Albireo' reincarnated into the body of the eldest son of a unheard-of duke's family, 'Aden Remes'! And...

"It's been a while, Dragon Slayer King!"

"The Underlord I thought I had defeated is inside my soul?!"

Will Aden be able to end his uncomfortable cohabitation(?) with the Underlord and prevent his resurrection?
description.ko:
아덴 알비레오, 그는 광룡과 지하 군주, 언더로드를 없애고 세상을 구한 영웅, "용살왕"이라 불렸다. 그러나 우정을 속삭였던 이들에게 배신당해, 죽음을 맞게 되는데...

"이런 식으로 되살아날 줄은 몰랐는데?"

언더로드 부활 15년 전, 듣도 보도 못한 공작가의 망나니 장남, '아덴 레메스'의 몸으로 회귀한 '아덴 알비레오'! 게다가…

"오랜만이구나, 용살왕이여!"

해치운 줄 알았던 언더로드가 내 영혼 안에 있다고?!

과연 아덴은 언더로드와의 불편한 동거(?)를 끝내고 그의 부활을 막아낼 수 있을 것인가!

description.en:
At the brink of death on an otherworldly battlefield, Jihoo Seol is granted the chance to relive his life. But all magic has its limits, and Seol only retains a few fragments of the man he will become. Memories of a future he has yet to live manifest in sporadic dreams and magic grants him unearned luck. When his magic fails, Seol's life takes a turn for the worse. Desperate and alone, he's approached by a mysterious woman with an offer that will change his life forever.

Will his dreams be enough to save him from the horrors that lie ahead?
description.fa:
بازنده، معتاد،رقت انگیز تنها بخشی از صفات او بود. اما، رویایی زودگذر که شاید اصلاً نتوان اسمش را رویا گذاشت، احساسی که زمانی از دست داده بود را دوباره در وجودش بیدار کرد. در دنیایی که حال به نام بهشت گمشده شناخته می‌شود، او با داشتن توانایی‌ای بسیار خاص قادر خواهد بود سرنوشتش را از نو شکل دهد.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%83%90%EC%8B%9D%EC%9D%98-%EC%9E%AC%EB%A6%BC/2354)
description.it:
“Il figlio della dea Gula è tornato.”  
  
Ero perso nel mondo del gioco d'azzardo.  
Avevo voltato le spalle alla mia famiglia e perfino tradito la mia compagna.  
Avevo sprecato ogni giorno della mia vita.  
La mia vita era spazzatura.  
La realtà mi aveva detto questo:  
Che non sarei valso nulla, qualsiasi cosa avessi fatto.  
Per cambiare la mia vita patetica, scelsi la fantasia, allora.  
Ciò nonostante, non cambiò nulla.  
Mi chiesi se avrei trovato la salvezza alla fine di questo lungo cammino.  
Ma fui obbligato ad inginocchiarmi in resa di fronte a una possente entità.  
La torre che avevo eretto con le mie mani crollò in frantumi.  
Solo per una volta, desiderai ardentemente di conoscere la verità sul mio conto.  
  
– Avvicinati, figlio mio…  
  
Questa volta non mi tirerò indietro.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%83%90%EC%8B%9D%EC%9D%98-%EC%9E%AC%EB%A6%BC/2354)
description.ko:
“굴라(Gula)의 아들이 돌아왔다.”
 
 도박에 미쳐 살았다. 
 가족과 등을 지고, 여자 친구도 배신했다. 
 하루하루 허송세월로 보냈다. 
 쓰레기 같은 인생이었다.
 
 현실이 말했다.
 넌 뭘 해도 안 되는 놈이라고.
 비참한 현실을 바꾸려 비현실을 선택했다.
 하지만 거기서도 마찬가지.
 
 고생 끝에 낙이 오나 싶었지만, 
 커다란 세력 앞에 허무하게 무릎 꿇었다. 
 공든 탑이 물거품이 되어버렸다.
 
 한 번쯤은 진정한 자신을 알고 싶었다.
 
 -가까이 오너라, 나의 아이여.
 
 이번에는 참지 않았다.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%83%90%EC%8B%9D%EC%9D%98-%EC%9E%AC%EB%A6%BC/2354)
description.ru:
Он был наркоманом, неудачником, жалким человеком. Но один мимолётный сон, который мог быть реальностью, пробудил его однажды утерянные чувства. Обладая уникальной способностью, он будет использовать её и странный сон, чтобы проложить свой собственный путь в мир, ныне известный как Потерянный Рай.

altTitles.ja: この恋、茶番につき!?

description.en:
Chako Hananoki thought she'd found happiness in a handsome fiancé, but when she realized a marriage to him would mean a total erasure of herself, she broke it off and moved back into her childhood home in the country—only to find a strange man and young woman living there? She finds a way to coexist with them, but when her stalker fiancé follows her home, she declares to him (and accidentally to the whole village as well) that this new man in her life is her husband?! A dramatic fake-marriage, found-family story for the ages. 

(Source: Kodansha)

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

Yoojin is an F-ranker overshadowed by his little brother, an S-ranker. All he does is get in his brother’s way, causing trouble wherever he goes. 

When a seemingly routine dungeon raid goes wrong and costs Yoojin his brother’s life, Yoojin decides to use the wish granted by clearing the dungeon to reset his timeline. The plan was to lead a quiet life from now on… but now it turns out he can help other people become S-rankers?! 

Maybe this is Yoojin’s chance at building his own entourage of powerful metahumans… but it may be easier said than done.

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iAg_R96Cnko)
description.ko:
F급 헌터.
그것도 잘나가는 S급 동생 발목이나 잡는 쓸모없고 찌질한 F급 형.
개판된 인생 대충 살다가 결국 동생 목숨까지 잡아먹고 회귀한 내게 주어진 칭호,
'완벽한 양육자'.
그래, 이번에는 나대지 말고 얌전히 잘난놈들 뒷바라지나 해 주자.
라고 생각했는데, S급들이 좀 이상하다.

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iAg_R96Cnko)
description.ru:
Охотник F-ранга. И вдобавок ко всему, старший брат, который даже не может начать догонять своего великолепного младшего брата, который уже стал S-ранговым.
Прожив жизнь, которая развалилась на части, и даже разрушив жизнь своего младшего брата, я получил еще один шанс, регрессировав на пять лет назад, я принял следующее решение:
— Я стану «идеальным воспитателем».
Правильно, на этот раз, вместо того, чтобы быть посредственным охотником, я буду тихо поддерживать тех, кто способнее.
Вот о чём я думал, но... S-ранги немного... странные.
